nodes.text: Ruso Zin was a male Human living during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY he was working for the Lady of Pain, a Rattataki crime lord operating on Tatooine, and brought her the news that her captive Tyresius Lokai had escaped.
Ruso Zin appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Bounty Hunter class mission on Tatooine.
